abstract.t: This document describes a method by which a source node can determine whether the underlying network can a) convey a packet that contains IPv6 destination options from itself to a destination node, and b) convey an ICMPv6 Parameter Problem message in the reverse direction. In order to support this method, this document defines a new IPv6 option, called the Unrecognized option. Implementation of the Unrecognized option is a trivial exercise, because the Unrecognized option elicits the same behavior from all nodes, regardless of whether they recognize the option.
